I ♥️ St. Joan of Arc. I love her piety & passion. Lead by God, Joan of Arc (18) led the French to victory over the English at Orléans. Joan, & her army, escorted Charles across enemy territory to Reims, enabling the coronation of Charles VII, the rightful King, July, 1429. https://t.co/ByFgvEYHU4

It's not exactly an entertaining watch, but The Passion of Joan of Arc by Carl Theodor Dreyer is profoundly moving. It's amazing what a film can accomplish when stripped to its essentials. https://t.co/WBYtT1v9iI
